Label: Purpose
Georeferenced: To indicate whether or not a scanned map or other imagery has a georeferenced version.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Georeferenced: Only one of two values are allowed: true or false.

Label: Commentary
Georeferenced: This field can be a shortcut for users to find georeferenced maps. Administrators can also employ the [Source](../ogm-aardvark/#source) field to link a paper map with its scan (e.g. a TIFF) and its georeferenced version (e.g. a GeoTIFF).
